channel.title: Community Site help
channel.description: Well im learning web programming and i had an idea for a site that is like facebook, myspace, etc. and i was wondering what language i should use and what i would have to do to make it so that when you register you get your own page, etc. Thanks in advance

item.title: Community Site help
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Mybb, post:26, topic:233746”][quote author=Westside Rep link=topic=308222.msg2467932#msg2467932 date=1222818061]

[quote author=Pwnd link=topic=308222.msg2467904#msg2467904 date=1222817052]

[quote author=Cald Panda link=topic=308222.msg2467893#msg2467893 date=1222816702]

PHP would be the easiest. But if you want a challenge go with what Pwnd said “JSP”.
[/quote]Not that it’s even a challenge. It’s overall better.
[/quote]I havn’t had much experience with it. What is it’s advantages over php?
[/quote]It uses the Java language.
-Done.

PHP is too picky. You’d have to study it for a long time before you learn it well enough to make a decent Website.

Java is easy to learn.

wtf[/quote]PHP isn’t picky at all… You can tell by just looking how variables work.

Read full topic

item.title: Community Site help
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

PHP Freaks

Which language is best for Social Networking website

Dear ALL, I am thinking about developing a Social Networking website and I am very much concentrating on speed and efficiency. My friends are saying that Python will be faster than PHP. But, I saw most of the social networking websites are built in...

hmm?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Avalanche Avalanche
item.description:
@Avalanche wrote:

Oh. I’m sorry i didn’t spell check my post closely enough for you. And once again, why come and insult me when i left out one letter in a post that wasn’t even addressed towards you? Do you really have nothing better to do?

item.title: Community Site help
item.dc:creator: @Avalanche Avalanche
item.description:
@Avalanche wrote:

i meant it was like facebook and like myspace because it was going to be a social networking site like pwnd said. and magma i never said i would make something anywhere near as good as the current main social networking sites nor did i plan to. but i have no idea why you even bother posting because your clearly not helping and i dont really think anybody besides a select group on this site care at all about your opinion especially me. So unless you are going to help then please just stay out of this

Read full topic

item.title: Community Site help
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Myspace and Facebook at not ‘community’ sites. They’re social networking sites lulz.

item.title: Community Site help
item.dc:creator: @Avalanche Avalanche
item.description:
@Avalanche wrote:

it is actually a unique idea. And you really shouldnt be judging it because you do not even know what it is. When i said it was like facebook and myspace, i ment that it is a community site. but the sites content and what is geared towards is nothing like either of those

Read full topic
